commits.description: Webhook for commit notifications - create in Discord channel settings -> Integrations -> Webhooks

issues.description: Webhook for issue notifications - create in Discord channel settings -> Integrations -> Webhooks

discussions.description: Webhook for discussion notifications - create in Discord channel settings -> Integrations -> Webhooks

pull_requests.description: Webhook for pull request notifications - create in Discord channel settings -> Integrations -> Webhooks

instructions.webhooks_setup: To set up webhooks: 1) Go to your Discord server 2) Select a channel 3) Go to channel settings 4) Go to Integrations 5) Click Webhooks 6) Click 'Create Webhook' 7) Copy the webhook URL and paste it in the corresponding field above
instructions.bot_setup: To set up the bot: 1) Go to https://discord.com/developers/applications 2) Create a new application 3) Add a bot to the application 4) Copy the token and paste it in the 'bot_token' field above 5) Invite the bot to your server using OAuth2 URL with appropriate permissions
instructions.github_setup: To connect GitHub: 1) Go to your GitHub repository settings 2) Click on 'Webhooks' 3) Click 'Add webhook' 4) Enter the URL of your deployed webhook server (e.g., https://yourdomain.com/github-webhook) 5) Set the content type to application/json 6) Add a secret if desired 7) Select the events you want to trigger the webhook
